page.title: 02EVERCREECH+STONEY STRATTON
page.content:
EVERCREECH
Evercreech is a large agricultural village which has a creamery,"St Ivel". St Ivel is a large complex,it's tower is a landmark rivalling the church,St Peters. Evercreech has a population of approximately 1800. It is a peaceful village with many old houses and several new estates.
STONEY STRATTON
Stoney Stratton is a hamlet joined on to Evercreech. It has a ford in Back Lane. The most modern house is in the High Street. There are 4 farms and the most popular animals kept are pigs.
